name: svelte5-typescript
description: Guidelines for handling TypeScript with Svelte 5
rules: Create src/ambient.d.ts to declare svelteHTML namespace with proper interfaces
Use 'moduleResolution': 'bundler' and 'module': 'ESNext' in both tsconfig.json and jsconfig.json
Include 'types': ['svelte'] in compiler options to ensure proper type loading
Add <svelte:options namespace='html' /> to components with namespace errors
Use svelte-check version 3.7.0+ and typescript 5.4.2+ for Svelte 5 compatibility
Include .d.ts files in tsconfig/jsconfig include arrays
Remove TypeScript workarounds when Svelte 5 stable is released
